text: vegetarian vegan food view from the balcony and talking to the chef Good access for wheelchairs

The staff were particularly good and a pleasure to deal with Also the breakfast was particularly good too good vegetarian and vegan options which are always essential but done with flair and not just an afterthought Top marks all round
Everything about it. The menu didn t have a good vegetarian vegan option which made it hard for me to have proper meals although the chef did go out of his way to make me something
Excellent value for money. English Breakfast could have better vegetarian option like good quality Vegetarian sausages
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
Breakfast was good Staff are very friendly Location is fantastic. Not many vegetarian options for food
Very friendly reception staff Breakfast had a good selection being a vegetarian this isnt always the case
The rooms were good the bathroom was lovely it was peaceful and spacious. No vegan options for food no lock on bathroom doors
Comfy bed very good service a lot of breakfast options including gluten free and vegetarian Nice and helpful staff
Great comfortable rooms Excellent Service Lounge service is good Had nice time. Vegetarian options are limited request you to add more options
The buffet breakfast was quite good and access to public transport was most convenient. More vegetarian options on the menu would be nice
Clean friendly hotel with nice view. Vegetarian option missing from breakfast menu Access by car via blackwall tunnel not good Suggest train access for the future
very convenient location from train station Good Vegetarian including Indian cuisine options within walking distance. Wifi was not working at night Resolved by morning Thin walls
Great location good breakfast although they can include more vegetarian options clean room friendly staff. slow wi fi the room was a little bit small and dark
The hotel is in a very good location for the area were we wanted good choice of pubs and restaurants nearby. Breakfast for a vegetarian was not value for the money charged
Good location friendly staff. Not much options in breakfast for vegetarian hot water was not available in the room one day out of the two I stayed there
Great location ideal for Hyde park concerts Lovely room Good car park would recommend to anyone wanting to go to London. Although breakfast was nice it would be nice to have some vegetarian options

Good location not far from Wimbledon centre funny organic Vegan cafe. Old building oddly shaped rooms barely usable shower my room was on the top floor under an angled roof the only way to use the shower was to squat in the tub
staff frendly very clean and comfortable good value for money. the breakfast not a lot of choice im a vegetarian lots of sausages bacon and cold meats although this suited the rest of my party
